function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access to healthcare services for indigenous populations living in LMIC","Impact":"Higher susceptibility to new viruses and diseases, increased mortality rates","Mitigation":"Improving access to healthcare, culturally sensitive healthcare approaches, and language interpretation services","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile health clinics, language interpretation apps","People":"Indigenous populations in LMIC","Owner":"Healthcare providers, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Challenges in detecting and preventing disease in homeless populations","Impact":"Difficulty in detecting cases and preventing disease outbreaks, increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Improving detection methods, providing healthcare services for homeless populations, creating shelter and care facilities","Technologies":"Mobile health units, rapid testing kits, shelter management systems","People":"Homeless populations","Owner":"Local governments, non-governmental organizations"},{"Description":"Healthcare deficiencies in prisons and detention centres","Impact":"Unimpeded spread of diseases, higher mortality rates, lack of preparedness for disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Improving healthcare services in prisons, training workers for disease outbreaks, addressing overcrowding in prisons","Technologies":"Telemedicine, electronic health records, disease surveillance systems","People":"Incarcerated and detained populations","Owner":"Prison authorities, government health agencies"}]}
